# viewDidChangeEffectiveAppearance()

**Instance Method**

Informs the view that its effective appearance changed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func viewDidChangeEffectiveAppearance()
```

## Responding to Appearance Changes

- **viewDidChangeBackingProperties()**: Responds when the view’s backing store properties change.

items.description: Responds when the view’s backing store properties change.
